title: Input schema for Instagram scraper
description: This scraper takes the provided URLs and attempts to scrape instagram posts, comments or detailed information from each of URL. It's able to scrape posts from user profiles, hashtags and places. Comments from posts and detailed information about all of these.

searchLimit.title: Search results limit
searchLimit.description: How many results from search should be processed

urls.title: URLs
urls.description: From which pages should posts/comments/details be loaded. Provide complete url to the profile, hashtag, place or post.

type.title: What to scrape
type.description: What to scrape from each page

limit.title: Max items
limit.description: How many posts or comments to scrape from each page, ignored when "Details" type is specified

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Proxy is required to run this actor! Either use Apify proxy, or provide your own proxy servers.
